org.lwjgl.opengl

Class GPU_DEVICE

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.opengl.GPU_DEVICE

  • public final class GPU_DEVICE
extends java.lang.Object
    Receives information about the display device specified by the deviceIndex parameter of the WGLNVGPUAffinity.wglEnumGpuDevicesNV(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer) function.
